page.title: 11REDCAR TARN cont.
page.content: The tools the pupils used were provided by Mr.Brennan of Keighley's Corporation Engineer's Department. One mould was designed to press a 28ft alloy canoe which,legend has it, Mr.Taylor could row across the tarn in five strokes. Councillor Mike Scarborough congratulated the pupils and said he hoped the site would create interest amongst visitors.He also added that Keighley Corporation were going to improve the tarn wall and construct a path around the tarn to provide a pleasant walk for visitors.This has now been completed. The pupil's finds were a pleasant surprise to the man responsible for their construction,89 year old Mr.Frank Taylor of Shann Lane, Keighley.
